story_galar_02_08000/2401_1101_0100_20: On the day of the tournament...
story_galar_02_08000/2401_1001_0200_10: Thank you, everyone, for gathering today!
story_galar_02_08000/2401_1001_0300_10: The upcoming match will be a group battle!
story_galar_02_08000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Each side will have nine Trainers, and they’ll go
head-to-head using Pasio’s three-on-three team
battle format.
story_galar_02_08000/2401_1001_0500_10:
The team with the most wins overall will be
the victor!
story_galar_02_08000/2401_1001_0600_10:
We’re gonna make this tournament epic! I hope
you all enjoy!
story_galar_02_08000/2401_1001_0700_10:
This is a chance for Marnie to shine. I’m countin’
on you all.
story_galar_02_08000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I can already hear Marnie’s victory comin’! The
only sound you’ll hear is the crowd’s cheer!
story_galar_02_08000/2401_1001_0900_10:
We’ll cheer for our Marnie till we lose
our voices!
